tags.name: SAML applications
tags.description: SAML (Security Assertion Markup Language) applications represent applications that use SAML protocol for single sign-on (SSO). These endpoints allow you to manage SAML applications, including their configurations and signing certificates.

id.description: The ID of the SAML application.

name.description: The name of the SAML application.

createdAt.description: The creation time of the SAML application.

get.description: Get the SAML metadata XML for the application.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

post.description: Create a new SAML application with the given configuration. A default signing certificate with 3 years lifetime will be automatically created.

name.description: The name of the SAML application.

description.description: Optional description of the SAML application.

customData.description: Optional custom data for the application.

acsUrl.description: The Assertion Consumer Service (ACS) URL where the SAML response will be sent.

201.description: The SAML application was created successfully.

422.description: Validation error. The ACS URL is invalid or other validation errors.

get.description: Get SAML application details by ID.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

patch.description: Update SAML application details by ID.

name.description: The name of the SAML application.

200.description: The SAML application was updated successfully.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

delete.description: Delete a SAML application by ID.

204.description: The SAML application was deleted successfully.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

422.description: The specified application is not a SAML application.

post.description: Create a new signing certificate for the SAML application.

lifeSpanInYears.description: The lifetime of the certificate in years (minimum 1 year).

201.description: The signing certificate was created successfully.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

get.description: Get all signing certificates of the SAML application.

id.description: The ID of the signing certificate.

certificate.description: The X.509 certificate in PEM format.

fingerprint.description: The SHA-256 fingerprint of the certificate.

isActive.description: Whether this certificate is currently active.

expiresAt.description: The expiration time of the certificate.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.

delete.description: Delete a signing certificate of the SAML application. Active certificates cannot be deleted.

204.description: The signing certificate was deleted successfully.

404.description: The SAML application or certificate was not found.

patch.description: Update the status of a signing certificate.

200.description: The signing certificate was updated successfully.

404.description: The SAML application or certificate was not found.

get.description: Handle the OIDC callback for SAML application and generate SAML response.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: The authorization code from OIDC callback.

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The state parameter from OIDC callback.

parameters.name: redirectUri
parameters.description: The redirect URI for the callback.

200.description: Returns an HTML form that automatically submits the SAML response.

404.description: The SAML application was not found.
